settings.title: Hydrawise Settings
settings.pref_intro1: The app can poll for updates to keep Homey synchronised to the devices.
settings.pref_intro2: This puts a load on the Hydrawise servers so keep switched off if possible.
settings.pref_intro3: If you need updates then keep the interval as high as you can.
settings.get_api_key: Click here to get an valid API key.
